ygData.subject: Re: Intro
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, Melissa, and welcome to our sisterhood . =) We re trying to firm up a date for an all-women meeting that I am hosting on Quellios, during the first week
ygData.messageBody:
Hi, Melissa, and welcome to our 'sisterhood'. =) We're trying to firm up a date for an all-women
meeting that I am hosting on Quellios, during the first week in August. Please let me know what
days are good for you, if you're interested in attending.

On a side note, ladies, I'm moving to MD tomorrow via cross-country truck *groans* so I will be
out of contact for a WHOLE WEEK. *sniffles*But I hope to have lots to read when I get my computer
set back up. (not so subtle hint) This is an interesting move for me because I've quit my job and
left my significant other at the same time, so bear with me and my "growing pains" as I move back
in with my parents to go back to college full-time (me and my two kids). Hope no one out there
can relate, but I'm sure some of you can. Anyway, good luck in your hunts, your friends, and your
fate, and I will see you all in about a week!

Sara, Povar
Valdaya, Rallos Zek
Ishtarre, Quellios
